title: quarkus-maven-plugin 3.0.0.CR1 - help command not available

labels.name: area/jbang
labels.description: Issues related to when using jbang.dev with Quarkus

body:
### Describe the bug

quarkus-maven-plugin 3.0.0.CR1 - help command not available

Regression against 2.16.5.Final and 3.0.0.Beta1

```
mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.0.0.CR1:help
[INFO] Scanning for projects...
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] BUILD FAILURE
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[INFO] Total time:  0.110 s
[INFO] Finished at: 2023-03-31T08:52:37+02:00
[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
[ERROR] Could not find goal 'help' in plugin io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.0.0.CR1 among available goals add-extension, add-extensions, analyze-call-tree, build, create, create-extension, create-jbang, dependency-tree, deploy, dev, generate-code, generate-code-tests, go-offline, image-build, image-push, info, list-categories, list-extensions, list-platforms, prepare, prepare-tests, remote-dev, remove-extension, remove-extensions, test, update -> [Help 1]
[ERROR]
[ERROR] To see the full stack trace of the errors, re-run Maven with the -e switch.
[ERROR] Re-run Maven using the -X switch to enable full debug logging.
[ERROR]
[ERROR] For more information about the errors and possible solutions, please read the following articles:
[ERROR] [Help 1] http://cwiki.apache.org/confluence/display/MAVEN/MojoNotFoundException
```

### Expected behavior

list of available commands

### Actual behavior

`[ERROR] Could not find goal 'help' in plugin io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.0.0.CR1 among available goals add-extension, add-extensions, analyze-call-tree, build, create, create-extension, create-jbang, dependency-tree, deploy, dev, generate-code, generate-code-tests, go-offline, image-build, image-push, info, list-categories, list-extensions, list-platforms, prepare, prepare-tests, remote-dev, remove-extension, remove-extensions, test, update -> [Help 1]`

### How to Reproduce?

`mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:3.0.0.CR1:help` fails

`mvn io.quarkus.platform:quarkus-maven-plugin:2.16.5.Final:help` passes

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

macOS

### Output of `java -version`

Java 17

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_

### Quarkus version or git rev

3.0.0.CR1

### Build tool (ie. output of `mvnw --version` or `gradlew --version`)

_No response_

### Additional information

_No response_
